name: Relic Entertainment Game Texture File
summary: Learn about .RGT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The RGT files can be found in the dataartmodels directory. You can convert the RGT file to the .DDS format to edit it in Photoshop using the DDS plugin. Once you are done editing you can convert it back to the RGT format and place it in its original directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
